item.title: Download Pulsar Modular P455 MDN Sidecar 1.6.0

The P455 offers Marc's analog workflow including analog synthesis, tube-controlled stereo imaging, powerful 2-bus stereo EQ, custom glue 2-bus compressor, and character unique of two high-end analog-to-digital converters.
